creator: larry.shatzer@mirotechnologies.com
text:
Thumbs.db is a file made by Windows XP, very similar to .DS_Store, and should 
be excluded by default.

creator: larry.shatzer@mirotechnologies.com

Patch to update DirectoryScanner.java and dirtask.html

Perhaps this should be fixed via a solution to the enhancement request in bug
12700 instead? I had thought 12700 was a pretty good idea, and am sort of
supprised it gained no comment.
